headline: SLB provides update on planned acquisition of ChampionX
summary: HOUSTON, February 25, 2025--SLB (NYSE: SLB) today announced that, in connection with SLB’s planned acquisition of ChampionX, all applicable waiting periods under the U.S. Hart-Scott-Rodino (HSR) Antitrust Improvements Act of 1976 have expired, and SLB is legally permitted to close the ChampionX transaction in the United States.

raw.headline: SLB provides update on planned acquisition of ChampionX
